dcterms:description: The DSL Corpus Collection contains sentences in Bulgarian, Macedonian, Serbian, Croatian, Bosnian, Czech, Slovak, Argentinian Spanish, Peninsular Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, European Portuguese, Malay, Indonesian, and a group containing texts written in a set of other languages.
